title: Orchids
marks:
Signature, Inscription, and Marks

L and R sides L center
description: blossoming grey orchids with black and grey foliage at center of fan; lines of text at L and R; rectangular relief stamp URC; rectangular intaglio stamp with rounded edges L center
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Marjorie Bissinger
